pages.title: Snow Leopard
pages.text: The snow leopard ($(o)Panthera uncia$()), commonly known as the ounce, is a species of large cat in the genus Panthera of the family Felidae.$(br2)The species is native to the mountain ranges of Central and South Asia.

pages.title: Snow Leopard
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Active during Nighttime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:beef$(br2)Number of Offspring: 3$(br2)Growth time: 5 Days
